title: The Big Chase (restored, colorized) (1954, crime, imdb score: 5.3)

sources.title: The Big Chase (restored, colorized) (1954, crime, imdb score: 5.3)
sources.description: The Big Chase is a 1954 American crime drama film directed by Arthur Hilton and starring Glenn Langan , Adele Jergens , Lon Chaney Jr. , Jim Davis and Douglas Kennedy . One of the film's scenes was directed by producer Robert L. Lippert Jr. This is the second film in which Langan appeared with Jergens, his real-life wife.
